# SlowQL Documentation

Welcome to **SlowQL**, the cyberpunkâ€‘styled SQL analyzer that helps you catch expensive, unsafe, or inefficient queries before they reach production. This documentation provides everything you need to install, configure, and use SlowQL effectively â€” from quick start guides to deep dives into architecture and detector systems.
